Santa_Cruz.Free Radio Santa Cruz:
Free Radio Santa Cruz (FRSC) is an unlicensed radio station in Santa Cruz, California, United States. The station has been on the air since Spring, 1995; its broadcast content is a mix of daily news, music, and cultural programs, produced both locally and nationally.
Because FRSC does not have a license from the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), the station is in open violation of US federal regulations.
